```{r bulk_istope_reference, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
library(xtable)
# read in the CSV file from /data
example_tab <- read.csv("data/bulk_istope_reference.csv", check.names = FALSE)
# for details of table formatting, see http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/xtable/vignettes/xtableGallery.pdf
print(xtable(example_tab, 
             size="footnotesize", 
             caption="The ranges of bulk delta 13C values of natural materials [modified from @Mukherjee2004]", 
             label="bulk_istope_reference"),
      include.rownames=FALSE,
      booktabs = TRUE,
      floating = FALSE, 
      tabular.environment='longtable',
      sanitize.text.function=function(x){x}
      )
```
